executive_summary: The Oscilloscope Manufacturing industry provides oscilloscopes used to provide observation of constantly varying signal voltages. Over the five years to 2021, industry revenue has experienced significant growth, primarily driven by product innovation and rising international demand. Research and development expenditure (R&D) has grown at an annualized rate of 1.6% during the current five-year period. With increased R&D expenditure, industry operators have extended their product lines, creating more demand for industry products. As a result, industry revenue has increased at an annualized rate of 5.4% to $496.0 million over the five years to 2021. However, in 2020, the COVID-19 (coronavirus) pandemic caused disruptions in manufacturing supply. However, as the economy has slowly recovered from the pandemic, industry revenue is expected to increase an estimated 2.1%. Notably, industry exports have grown at an annualized rate of 6.6% to $88.2 million during the five-year period, primarily driven by the international demand in the Asia-Pacific region. The Asia-Pacific region has the largest number of electronics and electronic component manufacturers, resulting in a higher demand for electronic test and measurement instruments, such as oscilloscopes. However, import competition, higher R&D costs and increased wages have placed downward pressure on the average industry profit margin. Average industry profit, measured as earnings before interest and taxes, is expected to account for 9.5% in 2021, a decrease from 10.4% in 2016. Over the five years to 2026, industry revenue is expected to grow at an annualized rate of 3.4% to $586.3 million.

current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Product innovation and technological change were the main drivers of revenue growth during the five-year period.
Growing demand for oscilloscopes in technology-related sectors.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Growing Demand in the International Market
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: International markets are driving growth in exports.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As the economy recovers over the next five years, investment into technology is likely to grow.
The growing sophistication of electronic devices will likely have a strong effect on the industry.
Continued demand for high-end products is expected to stimulate revenue growth.

industry_definition: This industry manufactures oscilloscopes. Oscilloscopes are electronic test instruments that provide observation of constantly varying signal voltages.
key_trends: Product innovations have become an important basis of competition in the industry.
Technological advancements have expanded demand for industry products.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Diversified industrial operators are typically defined as companies engaged in various classes of business within the Industrial industry.
In 2021, exports will generate an estimated 17.8% of total industry revenue.
The energy market accounts for an estimated 17.0% of industry revenue.

products_and_services.product_description: Entry-level scopes typically have a maximum bandwidth of 100 MHz.
Largely considered a mid-range product line.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: A major driver of product development and enhancement.
Demand increases with the development of new products.

international_trade_points.trade_description: Imported oscilloscopes are expected to satisfy domestic demand.
Demand from various regions including North America has increased.

business_locations.location_description: The West region has the highest percentage of establishments at 30.2%.

regulations_points.regulation_description: The industry is subject to numerous regulations.

barriers_points.barrier_title: High investment in R&D and fixed costs

basis_points.basis_description: The major points of competition involve brand strength and technology.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Purchase costs are the largest expense.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: Low capital expenditure to wages ratio
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The Oscilloscope industry has a relatively low level of capital intensity.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Oscilloscope manufacturers have to comply with various regulations.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Companies generally spend a great amount on R&D.

FAQs.question: How has your company competed with overseas manufacturers?
FAQs.answer: Malaysia has grown as a major oscilloscope manufacturer.
